sections.heading: allowance date, defined.Credit allowance date means, with respect to any qualified equity investment:(1) The date on which such investment is initially made; and(2) Each of the six anniversary dates of such date thereafter

sections.text:
77-1104.Credit allowance date, defined.

Credit allowance date means, with respect to any qualified equity investment:

(1) The date on which such investment is initially made; and

(2) Each of the six anniversary dates of such date thereafter.

SourceLaws 2012, LB1128, ยง 4.
